```{r}
cook_tracts = tigris::tracts(state=17, county = 31, cb = TRUE, year=2018)
cook_tracts
```

S2503 - FINANCIAL CHARACTERISTICS 
S2506 - FINANCIAL CHARACTERISTICS FOR HOUSING UNITS WITH A MORTGAGE
S2507 - FINANCIAL CHARACTERISTICS FOR HOUSING UNITS WITHOUT A MORTGAGE 

```{r}
cook_fin_acs = get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  table = "S2503",
  year = 2019,
  state = 17,
  county = 31,
  output = 'wide',
  geometry = T
)
```


```{r}
chicago_acs = get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  year = 2019,
  variables = c(med_income = "B19013_001",
                commute_tot = "B08128_001"),
  state = 17,
  county = 31,
  place = "Chicago city",
  output = 'wide',
  geometry = T
)
chicago_acs
```
